content.body: Are we still using IRC this meeting?  My IRCCloud subscription expired and I want to know whether I should renew it, or if we are on Matrix now
We have not formally adopted Matrix yet
though irccloud is free when not using it as a bouncer
sffc: we are still using IRC formally, but you can use the bridge channel.
content.formatted_body: sffc: we are still using IRC formally, but you can use the bridge channel.

content.body: I recommend against using the bridge channel
it just doesn't work very well
please use either a real IRC client, or Matrix, but don't try to use one for the other
